Class/Section: Deduces word meanings from contextual clues
Identifies and recalls direct facts in the passage
Identifies synonyms, antonyms and other words
Identifies the main idea and purpose of the passage
Infers using contextual clues and prior knowledge
Interprets the lines of a poem
Knows correct spellings and phonics in words
Understands idioms, proverbs and figures of speech
Understands organisation and context of the passage
Understands the usage of grammar concepts
